name: Math Expression Evaluator
description: Parses and evaluates mathematical expressions. It’s a safer and more math-oriented alternative to using JavaScript’s eval function for mathematical expressions.
author: Shinkai

expression.description: Math expression using operators (+,-,*,/,^), functions (sin,cos,sqrt), and parentheses. Example: '2*(3+4)'

result.description: Numeric result of expression evaluation. Returns error message if expression is invalid
